SELECT cp.* FROM android.change_people cp where cp.id IN (select distinct(c.author_id) from android.android_change c where c.project_id=project_id and c.author_date BETWEEN #{start, javaType=org.joda.time.LocalDateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, typeHandler=edu.hawaii.senin.trajectory.android.persistence.LocalDateTimeTimestampTypeHandler} AND #{end, javaType=org.joda.time.LocalDateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, typeHandler=edu.hawaii.senin.trajectory.android.persistence.LocalDateTimeTimestampTypeHandler} )
AND cp.email LIKE "${email_mask}"

select * from (select cp.*, count(distinct(DATE_FORMAT(c.author_date, '%Y%m%d'))) cnt from android.android_change c join android.change_people cp ON cp.id=c.author_id where c.project_id=#{project_id} and c.author_date BETWEEN #{start, javaType=org.joda.time.LocalDateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, typeHandler=edu.hawaii.senin.trajectory.android.persistence.LocalDateTimeTimestampTypeHandler} AND #{end, javaType=org.joda.time.LocalDateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, typeHandler=edu.hawaii.senin.trajectory.android.persistence.LocalDateTimeTimestampTypeHandler} group by c.author_id order by cnt desc) tmp where tmp.cnt>=#{cutoff}

SELECT sum(c.${field}) `value`, DATE_FORMAT(c.author_date, "%Y-%m-%d") `date` from android.android_change c join android.change_people cp on cp.id=c.author_id where c.`author_date` BETWEEN #{start, javaType=org.joda.time.LocalDateTime, jdbcType=DATE, typeHandler=edu.hawaii.senin.trajectory.android.persistence.LocalDateTimeDateTypeHandler} AND #{end, javaType=org.joda.time.LocalDateTime, jdbcType=DATE, typeHandler=edu.hawaii.senin.trajectory.android.persistence.LocalDateTimeDateTypeHandler} AND DATE_FORMAT(c.author_date, "%H") between 0 AND 24
AND cp.email LIKE "${email_mask}"
group by `date` order by `date`

SELECT sum(c.${field}) `value`, DATE_FORMAT(c.author_date, "%Y-%m-%d") `date` from android.android_change c where c.author_id=#{author_id} and c.project_id=#{project_id} AND c.`author_date` BETWEEN #{start, javaType=org.joda.time.LocalDateTime, jdbcType=DATE, typeHandler=edu.hawaii.senin.trajectory.android.persistence.LocalDateTimeDateTypeHandler} AND #{end, javaType=org.joda.time.LocalDateTime, jdbcType=DATE, typeHandler=edu.hawaii.senin.trajectory.android.persistence.LocalDateTimeDateTypeHandler} AND DATE_FORMAT(c.author_date, "%H") between 0 AND 24 and NOT(upper(c.subject) LIKE "%MERGE%") and NOT(upper(c.subject) LIKE "AM %") group by `date` order by `date`
